name: Pegu Push - Top 3D Penguin Run Racing Game
name_original: Pegu Push - Top 3D Penguin Run Racing Game
description:
The Most Addictive puzzle arcade game for iphone and touch ipod.

*Now with iOS4 Support*

If You liked Games like Boxed In,Iced In,Penguin Push then this game is for you..

The aim of the game is to push the Wooden Boxes on the holes.

>Use the penguin to move the Boxes.
>Remember you can push the Boxes but cant pull them this makes the game more interesting
>One small mistake can stop you from winning.

FEATURES

*Over 40 Challenging levels with increasing difficulty.
*Many hours of Gameplay.
*Quick Level Restart when you get struck.
*Quick Map View.
*iOS4 Support.
*Great Quality Graphics
*Easy Controls
